name: Match Mania
description:
Its valentines day, and the students of this unnamed school have decided to declare an in-school holiday. Everyone is looking to find their perfect match today and it's your job to make it happen. You need to match students with the same colour above their heads together. You can help do this by redirecting students using the icons on the ground which you can rotate to send them in different directions.

Match mania was made as a university project in the span of 6 weeks with 2 weeks of that being production time. Our limitations were that we had to make a turn-based game about anything to do with any holiday.

Student Project By:

- Caleb Palmer 

- Jacob Ryan

- Callum Nottage
